channel.title: BBC Sport | Boxing | UK Edition
channel.description: The latest BBC Boxing news plus blogs, analysis, results, schedule, rankings, boxing tips and tactics, video and audio.
channel.copyright: Copyright: (C) British Broadcasting Corporation, see http://news.bbc.co.uk/sport1/hi/help/rss/4517815.stm for terms and conditions of reuse

item.title: Sick Cleverly cancels WBO defence
item.description: Nathan Cleverly withdraws from his WBO light-heavyweight title defence against Robin Krasniqi because of illness.

item.title: Scot Taylor secures Team GB place
item.description: Lightweight Josh Taylor qualifies for the Olympics, ensuring there will be one Scot in the GB boxing team.

item.title: Groves out of world title fight
item.description: George Groves pulls out of his WBO super-middleweight world title fight against Robert Stieglitz because of injury.

item.title: GB boxers progress in qualifier
item.description: Heavyweight Warren Baister moves closer to Olympic qualification with a thrilling win over France's Abdoulaye Diane in Turkey.

item.title: Fury stops Rogan in Belfast bout
item.description: Former British and Commonwealth heavyweight champion Tyson Fury remains unbeaten as he stops Martin Rogan in five rounds.

item.title: Khan one-dimensional - Peterson
item.description: Lamont Peterson says Amir Khan is incapable of altering his game-plan for their May rematch and that his British rival is mentally "all over the place".

item.title: Klitschko to fight Thompson again
item.description: Wladimir Klitschko defends his heavyweight world titles against American Tony Thompson on 7 July.

item.title: GB Boxing picks women for Worlds
item.description: Britain's three female Olympic boxing hopefuls are chosen for next month's World Championships in Qinhuangdao, China.

item.title: McCloskey has change of opponent
item.description: Paul McCloskey has a change of opponent for his contest on 5 May after former IBF champion Julio Diaz pulls out of the bout.

item.title: Mayweather & Pacquiao irk Leonard
item.description: Boxing legend Sugar Ray Leonard implores Floyd Mayweather and Manny Pacquiao to fight, for the sake of their own legacies.

item.title: Bellew-McIntosh fight postponed
item.description: Tony Bellew's British light-heavyweight title defence against Danny McIntosh is put back two weeks to 27 April after McIntosh pulled out with a chest infection.

item.title: Sexton eyes titles with Warrens
item.description: Cheshunt's Ashley Sexton believes he can become a future world champion, after signing with Frank Warren Promotions.

item.title: Maccarinelli facing title rematch
item.description: Enzo Maccarinelli is ordered to a rematch against Shane McPhilbin for the British cruiserweight title.

item.title: Cleverly receives Hopkins boost
item.description: Nathan Cleverly receives a boost in his bid for a light-heavyweight unification clash with Bernard Hopkins.

item.title: Chisora to challenge licence ban
item.description: Dereck Chisora appeals against the withdrawal of his licence by the British Boxing Board of Control.
